SEARCH
Package projeto_ed.Game

Interface IMap

All Known Implementing Classes:
Map
public interface IMap
The Map interface represents a map with vertices and an adjacency matrix. It allows creating a map with a specified number of vertices and performing various operations on the map.

  • Method Summary

    Description

    generateRandomCompleteDirectionalGraph(int taxaCobertura)

  • Method Details

    • generateRandomCompleteDirectionalGraph

      void generateRandomCompleteDirectionalGraph(int taxaCobertura)
      Generates a random directed complete graph with a specified coverage rate. The method populates the adjacency matrix with random distances between vertices, ensuring that the graph remains directed and complete until it is connected.
      Parameters:
      taxaCobertura - The coverage rate indicating the likelihood of creating an edge between vertices (0 to 100).

    • generateRandomCompleteNonDirectionalGraph

      void generateRandomCompleteNonDirectionalGraph(int taxaCobertura)
      Generates a random undirected complete graph with a specified coverage rate. The method populates the adjacency matrix with random distances between vertices, ensuring that the graph remains undirected and complete until it is connected.
      Parameters:
      taxaCobertura - The coverage rate indicating the likelihood of creating an edge between vertices (0 to 100).

    • printMap

      void printMap()
      Prints the current state of the map, including occupied vertices and flags.

    • printEdges

      void printEdges()
      Prints the edges of the map along with their weights.

    • weightedShortestPathIterator

      Iterator<Vertex> weightedShortestPathIterator(Vertex startVertex, Vertex targetVertex)
      Returns an iterator over the vertices of the weighted shortest path from the startVertex to the targetVertex.
      Parameters:
      startVertex - The starting vertex of the path.
      targetVertex - The target vertex of the path.
      Returns:
      An iterator over the vertices of the weighted shortest path.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the start or target vertex is invalid.

    • generateVertexes

      void generateVertexes(int mapSize)
      Generates edges and adds them to the map.
      Parameters:
      mapSize - The number of edges to generate.

    • treeIterator

      Iterator<Vertex> treeIterator(Vertex startVertex, Vertex targetVertex)
      Returns an iterator over the vertices of the minimum spanning tree using Prim's algorithm.
      Parameters:
      startVertex - The starting vertex of the tree.
      targetVertex - The target vertex of the tree.
      Returns:
      An iterator over the vertices of the minimum spanning tree.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the start or target vertex is invalid.

    • printNeighbors

      void printNeighbors(Bot bot)
      Prints the neighbors of the specified bot, along with the associated costs.
      Parameters:
      bot - The bot for which neighbors are to be printed.
